|eth_chip2_brand=National Semiconductor |eth_chip2_model=DP83816;VS412AL, DP83816AVNG; |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips=PCI CardBus Controller;Texas Instruments;PCI1420;PCI1420PDV, 42A2FEW;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;2.4.20; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=Junxion_Box |default_ssid_regex=^Junxion_Box$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=junxion |oui=00:02:6F |oui_eth=00:00:24 }} [http://www.junxionbox.com/pdf/Junxion%20Box%20JB-110%20User%20Guide.pdf User's guide]
This device's main board is a Soekris Engineering net4521. Ethernet chip part numbers are DP83816AVNG. The Flash is a CompactFlash card.
The power supply included with the device is a '''SMP Technology, Inc.''' VAL1512 (12V, 1.25A).
